page.title: 06SECTION 3 & SECTION 4
page.content:
AMENITIES - 01 - l2; 02 - l3 & l4; 37 - free car parking 38 - hire of rowing boats
SECTION 4 - Pooley Bridge Village LOCAL HISTORY - The name Pooley is derived from Pul Hou which means the pool besides the hill. The pool is part of the river Eamont which flows out of Ullswster, and the Bridge spans the river (Slide A) HOUSING - 83 houses of which 2l are second homes or holiday cottages and 4 are unoccupied. l30 people live in the remainder and are for the most part elderly, there being only 8 children of school age. The village is popular with tourists and extremely busy in the summer. ARTS & CRAFTS - Painting and Ceramics Studio in the High Street. Annual Art Exhibition in the Village Hall.
